nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE(`azure.synapse.workspaces.BuiltinSqlPoolDataProcessedBytes`) AS 'Average Data Processed', SUM(`azure.synapse.workspaces.SQLStreamingConversionErrors`) AS 'Total Data Conversion Errors', AVEREAGE(`azure.synapse.workspaces.IntegrationLinkProcessingLatencyInSeconds`) AS 'Average Link Latency', AVERAGE(`azure.synapse.workspaces.SQLStreamingResourceUtilization`) AS 'Average Resource Utilization' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces'

rawConfiguration.text:
# Azure Synapse Analytics
Azure Synapse Analytics is an enterprise analytics service that accelerates time to insight across data warehouses and big data systems. It brings together the best of SQL technologies used in enterprise data warehousing, Apache Spark technologies for big data, and Azure Data Explorer for log and time series analytics.

nrqlQueries.query: FROM  Metric SELECT SUM(`azure.synapse.workspaces.SQLStreamingConversionErrors`) AS 'Total Data Conversion Errors' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE(`azure.synapse.workspaces.BuiltinSqlPoolDataProcessedBytes`) AS 'Average Data Processed' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE(`azure.synapse.workspaces.SQLStreamingResourceUtilization`) AS 'Average Resource Utilization' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT AVERAGE(`azure.synapse.workspaces.IntegrationLinkProcessingLatencyInSeconds`) AS 'Average Link Latency' WHERE collector.name = 'azure-monitor' and azure.resourceType = 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces' TIMESERIES AUTO
